Name: Inspect @scope rules
Description: Can I inspect the CSS @scope at-rules and the scoping root element?

Notes: 1. Inspect the element that has `@scope` rules applied. The ruleset will be visible in the **Style** pane under the `@scope` block declaration.
2. Hover over the **scoping root element** to highlight the element on the page. Click the element to directly jump to the node in the **Element** tree.
